abstract: Renee Nicole Doucuer, who was managing research station at the South Pole when she suffered a stroke, is airlifted from the isolated base.
snippet: Renee Nicole Doucuer, who was managing a research station at the South Pole when she suffered a stroke on Aug. 27, was airlifted from the isolated base on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Renee Nicole Doucuer, who was managing a research station at the South Pole when she suffered a stroke on Aug. 27, was airlifted from the isolated base on Monday.

headline.main: Stroke Victim Is Flown From South Pole
headline.print_headline: Stroke Victim Is Flown From South Pole
headline.seo: Stroke Victim Is Flown From South Pole
